availability.p: Publicly available from The New York Public Library's Digital Collections

projectDesc.p: TEI encoding of excerpt from Virginia Woolf's 1928 Diary, with both the manuscript and the text.

facsimile.head: Manuscript of Virginia Woolf's diary in 1928

body.p:
